parameter.name: ContosoAdsContext-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: ContosoAdsContext Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=(localdb)\v11.0; Initial Catalog=ContosoAds; Integrated Security=True; MultipleActiveResultSets=True;

parameterEntry.scope: C:\\Users\\sama\\Downloads\\Simple\ Azure\ Website\ with\ WebJobs\ using\ the\ WebJobs\ SDK\\C\#\\ContosoAdsWeb\\obj\\Release\\Package\\PackageTmp\\Web\.config$
